column4: Hi! I would like to launch emerald window decorator with a command but emerald --replace does not works
thats just the process id for emeral - it means it's running
nop i have two themes installed, perhaps I have to indicate which one to choose?
yes, you then need to launch emerald theme manager
i would like to do it with  command lines, its for a script
like everybody switch automatically compiz/metacity while lauching vlc for example
I can do it but while relanching compiz, the emerald theme does not come back
well 1.) running desktop effects over a remote desktop is not a good idea 2.) you just need to modify the files and dir's in people /home .emerald directory

ahh you said vlc , not vnc, sorry
ok, I juste want to do this on my own desktop
why do you not just setup emerald to be your default window manager instead of stopping/starting it
